Greetings from the Mayor
========================

Welcome to the City of Anahuac website!
---------------------------------------

### The Mayor is the chief executive officer of the City, they must actively ensure that the laws and ordinances of the municipality are properly carried out.

They must also inspect the conduct of each subordinate municipal officer and shall cause any negligence, carelessness, or other violation of duty to be prosecuted and punished. They must give City Council any information and shall recommend to the governing body any measure, that relates to improving the finances, police, health, security, cleanliness, comfort, ornament, or good environment of the municipality. The Mayor is also the emergency management director of the City.

Charles
Hightower
Mayor
